LanguageData.EMPigmentYellow.label: tattoo pigment (pollen)
LanguageData.EMPigmentYellow.description: A special pigment made from psychoid leaves, imbued with mechanites long since dormant in the soil. A strong beautiful yellow, reminiscent of flowers.
LanguageData.EMPigmentGreen.label: tattoo pigment (forest)
LanguageData.EMPigmentGreen.description: A special pigment made from healroot, imbued with mechanites long since dormant in the soil. A deep and alluring green, like a secluded wood.
LanguageData.EMPigmentRed.label: tattoo pigment (blood)
LanguageData.EMPigmentRed.description: A special pigment made from devilstrand mushrooms, imbued with mechanites long since dormant in the soil. As vivid and bright as freshly spilt blood.
LanguageData.EMPigmentBlue.label: tattoo pigment (sky)
LanguageData.EMPigmentBlue.description: A special pigment made from smokeleaf plants, imbued with mechanites long since dormant in the soil. A calming blue, like a summer sky.
LanguageData.EMPigmentTurquoise.label: tattoo pigment (sea)
LanguageData.EMPigmentTurquoise.description: A complex colour blended from forest and sky pigments, imbued with mechanites long since dormant in the soil. Impressive like a stormy sea.
LanguageData.EMPigmentLime.label: tattoo pigment (grass)
LanguageData.EMPigmentLime.description: A complex colour blended from pollen and forest pigments, imbued with mechanites long since dormant in the soil. A vibrant green not unlike a meadow.
LanguageData.EMPigmentOrange.label: tattoo pigment (flame)
LanguageData.EMPigmentOrange.description: A complex colour blended from blood and pollen pigments, imbued with mechanites long since dormant in the soil. Deep and powerful, like the sun.
LanguageData.EMPigmentPurple.label: tattoo pigment (royal)
LanguageData.EMPigmentPurple.description: A complex colour blended from sky and blood pigments, imbued with mechanites long since dormant in the soil. An extremely impressive and regal purple.
